model

Class CanvasInfo

  • java.lang.Object
    • model.CanvasInfo

  • public final class CanvasInfo
extends java.lang.Object
    Class containing information and logic about the canvas, placement of elements and logic related to positioning the board on the canvas.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      CanvasInfo(javafx.scene.canvas.Canvas canvas, double cellSize)
      Constructor using canvas and cellSize as arguments.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods

      Assigns values to placementX and placementY based on the width/height of the canvas, the cellSize, the boardWidth and boardHeight.
      void dragPlacement(double x, double y)
      Alters the variables placementX and placementY.
      double getCanvasheight()
      Gets the height of the current canvas.

      Gets the width of the current canvas.

      Gets the placementX.

      Gets the placementY.

      Set the height for the canvas.

    • Constructor Detail

      • CanvasInfo

        public CanvasInfo(javafx.scene.canvas.Canvas canvas,
                  double cellSize)
        Constructor using canvas and cellSize as arguments. Assigns the same dimensions to the class canvas as the canvas provided as the argument in the constructor. The class cellSize is also assigned the same value as the cellSize provided as an argument in the constructor.
        Parameters:
        canvas - the canvas provided as argument
        cellSize - the cellSize provided as argument

    • Method Detail

      • getCanvasWidth

        public double getCanvasWidth()
        Gets the width of the current canvas. The width is returned in type double.
        Returns:
        the width of the current canvas

      • setCanvasWidth

        public void setCanvasWidth(double canvasWidth)
        Sets the width of the current canvas. Using the provided canvasWidth to set the width of the canvas.
        Parameters:
        canvasWidth - the new width

      • getCanvasheight

        public double getCanvasheight()
        Gets the height of the current canvas. The height is returned in type double.
        Returns:
        the height of the current canvas

      • setCanvasheight

        public void setCanvasheight(double canvasheight)
        Set the height for the canvas.
        Parameters:
        canvasheight - the height to be assigned to the canvas

      • getCellSize

        public double getCellSize()
        Gets the current cellSize.
        Returns:
        the current size of the cell

      • setCellSize

        public void setCellSize(double cellSize)
        Sets the size of the cells. The cellSize is assigned the new value provided as an argument.
        Parameters:
        cellSize - the new cell size

      • getPlacementX

        public double getPlacementX()
        Gets the placementX. Represents the length along the X-axis to align the drawing of the board by.
        Returns:
        the placementX

      • getPlacementY

        public double getPlacementY()
        Gets the placementY. Represents the length along the Y-axis to align the drawing of the board by.
        Returns:
        the placementY

      • setPlacementX

        public void setPlacementX(int placeColVar)
        Determines the placementX. The variable placementX is used in order to place the drawing of the board on the canvas according to added columns.
        Parameters:
        placeColVar - the number of added columns

      • setPlacementY

        public void setPlacementY(int placeRowVar)
        Determines the placementY. The variable placementY is used in order to place the drawing of the board on the canvas according to added rows.
        Parameters:
        placeRowVar - the number of added rows

      • centerPlacement

        public void centerPlacement(int boardWidth,
                            int boardHeight)
        Assigns values to placementX and placementY based on the width/height of the canvas, the cellSize, the boardWidth and boardHeight. The values given as arguments to this method is the dimensions of the board and is used in order to center the drawing on the canvas.
        Parameters:
        boardWidth - the width of the current board
        boardHeight - the height of the current board

      • dragPlacement

        public void dragPlacement(double x,
                          double y)
        Alters the variables placementX and placementY. This is done when the board is "dragged" in order to change the location on the canvas.
        Parameters:
        x - the amount of movement along the X-axis
        y - the amount of movement along the Y-axis
